author: Ina Fried, Margaret Harding McGill
title: U.S. internet lifelines face a tough test
description: With the in-person economy in the U.S. essentially shut down, the internet has never been more critical. The key question now is how well the network can handle the unprecedented demand. Why it matters : Europe's networks have already come under strain, and i…
content:
